title: Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules
content: Special Customs Rule No. 1 is hereby amended by adding to the places excepted from examination therein the following:
In the customs district of Philadelphia, office of the collector: Five chiefs of division.
citation: Grover Cleveland, Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/206403
